name: OURPLESWAP | VS. DEKS MAN
description:
The mod follows Grace and Brooke in the year 2022 as they are selected as Play testers for the recently rereleased Bazbun Arcade games, all remade and ported into a VR playable experience!
Though, are things as simple as they really seem?
VS. DEKS MAN is a unique reimagining of VS. OURPLE GUY, its story, and its cast.
Swapping the character's roles, yet still keeping their personalities, allowing them to be explored further than before.

Want more Ourple Guy? Then this is the mod for you.
author: TillyFrog
